long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve your meeting with real-time assistance - transcribe, summarize, and respond based on your custom prompts.

Outmeet is dialog assistant, wrapped over your OpenAI account and powered by microphone and tab audio capturing. With Outmeet, you can focus on the conversation while the assistant transcribes, summarizes, and responds in real-time, making your meetings more productive and actionable.

Key Features 

📝 Real-time Transcription - automatically transcribe your conversations for easy reference and review.

💡 AI-Powered Summaries - use your own prompts to summarize meetings, AI-generated overviews that help you quickly grasp key points.

🗣️ Customizable AI Responses: use your own prompts to guide the assistant’s real-time responses, making it adaptable to various use cases such as interviews, project discussions, or podcasts.

🎯 No Additional Costs: Outmeet is free to use—you only pay for the OpenAI traffic used through your account.

🔗 Seamless Integration: Easily integrate your OpenAI account without extra payments or complicated setups.

🔒 Privacy First: Outmeet operates securely with your data, using your own OpenAI credentials for interactions.

Outmeet is perfect for anyone who needs to capture important moments and insights from meetings in real-time. Whether you’re summarizing an important conference call or generating intelligent follow-up questions during a live interview, Outmeet adapts to your needs and makes your meetings more efficient.
